context: Act 1 Chapter 1.1 — Maya's radio comms during the first Pit race

lines.speaker: Maya (Radio)
lines.text: Your RPMs are too high in third! Short-shift! Short-shift into fourth NOW!
The radio crackles. Maya's voice cuts through the engine noise like a scalpel.

lines.speaker: Maya (Radio)
lines.text: You're in third. Closing on second. Don't overdrive it — let the gap come to you.
The car ahead weaves, trying to block your line. The crowd is a blur of faces and phone screens on either side.

lines.speaker: Maya (Radio)
lines.text: Easy... easy... wait for the corner. He'll go wide. He always goes wide.

lines.label: overtaking
lines.speaker: Maya (Radio)
lines.text: That's it! That's IT! Now don't get greedy — hold your line!

lines.speaker: Maya (Radio)
lines.text: You've got him. Smooth inputs. Don't throw it away now.

lines.label: leading
lines.speaker: Maya (Radio)
lines.text: Are you kidding me? Are you KIDDING me right now?!

lines.speaker: Maya (Radio)
lines.text: You're leading! In a CRX! I — okay. Okay. Focus. Just bring it home.

lines.label: falling_behind
lines.speaker: Maya (Radio)
lines.text: You're losing ground. Don't panic — find your braking point and trust it.

lines.speaker: Maya (Radio)
lines.text: Stop watching his taillights. Watch the road. Drive YOUR race.

lines.label: final_stretch
lines.speaker: Maya (Radio)
lines.text: Last stretch. Whatever you've got left — give it everything.
The radio cuts to static. It's just you and the engine and the finish line burning in the distance.
